Happy New Year!

January 1, 2015 7:32 am

It's 2015! How'd you ring in the new year?

As for me and my girls, we spent it with great friends, lots of food, some play-dough and, of course, arm wrestling!

Are you jealous yet?

Well, it gets even better.

My girlfriends and I had an "Ugly face war" with friends in Ohio through Facebook. We were all winners (if you wanna call us that) and had a wonderful night!

Hope your 2015 brings much joy and laughter!

I will leave you with some pics from the evening (apologizing in advance if our craziness scares you)Â and will post again soon.

Happy New Year!

Kelly
